channel.title: Harvey Sid Fisher – Los Angeles Visionaries Association

item.title: Harvey Sig Gig
item.dc:creator: Harvey Sid Fisher
item.description: Harvey Sid Fisher says: I’ll be joined by my back up singers and some musicians. I’ll be doing some astrology songs and some duets from my “Battle of the Sexes” album of couples fighting. Boulevard Music is like McCabe’s on Pico. There will be other performers on the menu. Tickets: $4. Sample some Astrology Songs: https://www.youtube.com/astrologysongs
item.content:encoded:
Harvey Sid Fisher says: I’ll be joined by my back up singers and some musicians. I’ll be doing some astrology songs and some duets from my “Battle of the Sexes” album of couples fighting. Boulevard Music is like McCabe’s on Pico. There will be other performers on the menu. Tickets: $4.

Sample some Astrology Songs: https://www.youtube.com/astrologysongs

item.title: Harvey Sid Fisher
item.dc:creator: Harvey Sid Fisher
item.description: Harvey Sid Fisher singer/songwriter, writes screenplays, is an actor, and is one of L.A.’s top ten million photographic models.
item.content:encoded: Harvey Sid Fisher singer/songwriter, writes screenplays, is an actor, and is one of L.A.’s top ten million photographic models.
